website_summaries.verdict: A top-notch fish and game cleaning table that is lightweight, durable and simple to transport.
pros: Comes with a 2.5" deep sink for shallow water and 4.5" extra deep sink for added convenience
Strong polyethylene top will maintain its appearance for years to come
cons: Drain strainers and piping are not standard sizes

customer_reviews.title: It’s portable because it folds up and we can transport it when we travel.
customer_reviews.text: The Perfect Fish Cleaning Table, Full Drain System, 2 Sinks, Quick Fold, Easy Transport and Storage was the best gift for our 46th Anniversary. We love it because it makes our life at the lake a little easier when cleaning our catch of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Godwin-Starks

customer_reviews.title: A "Glampers" Dream Come True!
customer_reviews.text: I am as excited about this purchase as I was our pop-up camper last year. We've used it a few times now and I just love it. It's easy to put together, which is important because I take it completely apart to clean and fully dry before storing it to make sure there's no issue of mold. My only complaint is that I wish it came in a grey color as the white is starting to show some stains from being outdoors for days on end, but hey, I didn't really expect it to stay that way. We don't have the faucet attachment as a hose and nozzle work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Love this for camping
customer_reviews.text: Washing dishes in my tiny trailer is so annoying. This really is awesome for camping. I bought 2 large plastic containers to catch the water underneath. I love that it folds up easily. Wish I would have found years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Julia McKernan

customer_reviews.title: Drain parts rot over time
customer_reviews.text: I've had this table for 2 years and the drain piping has crumbled. The drain strainers and piping are not standard sizes and I can't find replacement parts. If you're needing it short term, it's fine. Otherwise, it will fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: James Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Using it on a catio!
customer_reviews.text: I know my cat likes to sit in sinks, and this little table is great for building a higher place for her to sit, and the little area for trash is perfect for making a ramp up to the surface. Great value and perfect for my kitty :) I have a bed in one of the sinks so far and still have more to do to improve it, but it's a great table.
customer_reviews.author: S. OConnor

customer_reviews.title: Very handy portable table
customer_reviews.text: I compete in "backyard" non professional bbq events. This table satisfies local requirements for having a cleaning station. Two 5 gallon buckets under the drain tubes collects the dish and utensil cleaning and rinse water and the handy trash bag attachment works well too. I also use it when I take my RV camping/fishing. It's very versatile and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Art A

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Kitchen Must
customer_reviews.text: We have a popup camper but we do not turn the water on to the inside. We set this up to prep our meals on then take off the covers and wash the dishes. It worked perfect and exactly what we were looking for. The trash bag holder is a great plus when prepping meals and cleaning off dishes. I highly recommend this for a camp kitchen accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Kay Roundy

customer_reviews.title: ... even - I fixed it but it really seems like this was a return item
customer_reviews.text: Legs bent and not even - I fixed it but it really seems like this was a return item resold
customer_reviews.author: Brad Prose

customer_reviews.title: Works great after first use.
customer_reviews.text: Don't forget to tighten the plugs from the bottom. It will leak. I love that it has a strainer. We can't wait to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Julianie Spookie McCray

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving advertising
customer_reviews.text: Misleading as can be! There’s no faucet hardware included with this at all. Just two sinks with plastic (cheap) drains. Let down big time.
customer_reviews.author: Danial E Bennett

customer_reviews.title: We have a camp kitchen in our very remote property ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a camp kitchen in our very remote property in NM. This sink will make life so much easier than using the 2 pan system--one for wash water, the other for rinsing---which we must carry out of the camp to dump while not spilling them on our self. We have the Coleman on-demand hot water heater...so with these two items we will have a more user friendly experience when we are there.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy  Brady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sink and prep table
customer_reviews.text: This table is the best! We cater bbq's and tailgates. We use this for a sink and a cutting table. A 1/2 steamtable pan fits perfectly in the shallow sink. Cut on the right side using the sink cover as a cutting board and slide the meat into the pan on the left. We hooked up a battery powered camp shower as a water supply. The garbage port works well. The clamps hold the bag in place. The only modification we made was to raise the table 4inches by adding PVC pipe 'extenders' to the legs. You can bungee a roll of paper towels or make a bungee towel rack on the sides. We will buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Great for every use: Camping, cleaning fish, processing meat from hunting.... Having two sinks, one deep and one shallow is very handy. The only way to make this better would be if it included a faucet, instead of just a hose holder. This is easily fixed by clamping a faucet on the side.
customer_reviews.author: WalkingDeadFan

customer_reviews.title: Great game processing table!!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for everything from cleaning fish to canning collard greens!!! Makes a great wild game processing table. Light enough to move and strong enough to hold just about anything food or camping related. Height is right to avoid back fatigue and the multiple sinks make processing meat and vegetables a whole lot easier and faster. Refuse bag holder, goose neck faucet and water hose holder make this table a winner!!! Versatility can't be beat for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J

customer_reviews.title: I do like the top and dual sinks Not as sturdy as ...
customer_reviews.text: I do like the top and dual sinks Not as sturdy as expected. Wobbly when used. Removed legs and mounted on the studs inside the fish cleaning structure.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Doely

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This was a father's day gift for my hubby from our fur baby. It was a hit. He is an avid fisherman and uses it quite a bit. Makes for very easy cleaning and great clean up. Perfect for any fisherman/woman!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Case

customer_reviews.title: CLEANING STATION
customer_reviews.text: THIS TABLE IS VERY WELL MADE I HAVE USED TO CLEAN MY FISH, AND ALSO TO SET UP NEXT TO THE GRILL WHEN COOKING FOR FRIENDS WHEN THEY COME OVER, I LIKE THE WAY THE TOPS STAY IN PLACE, I JUST LIKE IT I WOULD RECOMEND IT
customer_reviews.author: HILDALGO1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really great, adaptable, tough material, innovative design. Really stepped up my camping game.
customer_reviews.author: John Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: I'm thankful for the table. My only "problem" is ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm thankful for the table. My only "problem" is that I've used it while roasting coffee here @ home and I find that the table can be challenging to clean while trying to remove coffee stains. I recognize this isn't the fault of the table nor does it reflect poorly on the quality(ies) of the table. The table is everything I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very practical and well-designed; good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, well-made and very practical. Makes filleting fish at home a pleasure, instead of a messy struggle. I should have bought this years ago! Sturdy and quite tall for easy working.
customer_reviews.author: desmobob

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure that the table was shipped damaged because the box it came in was fine and not damaged
customer_reviews.text: I received the table two weeks ago and used it for the fist time on our camping trip this past weekend. When setting up the table we noticed that one of the legs did not lock correctly and the table has a 3inch crack. I'm sure that the table was shipped damaged because the box it came in was fine and not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been cleanig fish on the tailgate of his truck for years. After he's through, he will complain that his back hurts because he has to bend over. This table is higher which eliminates the back pain issue. He likes the area that he can hook a garbage bag to. He fills the deeper basin with water and put the fillets in there as he cleans the fish. Very easy clean-up and a very sturdy table.
customer_reviews.author: Spanky1960

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Use outside with my RV's outside shower to save on the gray tank fill.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: This sink is just what I needed for camping . We set it up next to the camp site faucet if there is one and use a coiled water hose , glad we bought it makes meal prep ,cooking , and clean up so much easier..
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: Handy table at the dock
customer_reviews.text: We have a waterfront property with just a large storage shed (no plumbing). So we were happy to find this table that was designed with 2 sinks that can drain into buckets. We use the table in the shed by setting it next to a shelf on which we place a water jug that is above one of the sinks. We turn the water on and then use the sink to wash our hands and other items as needed. If we need the table outdoors, it is light and easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Sheridan H.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our camp
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our camp. Campmates loved having a sink for doing dishes and brushing our teeth in camp. Very sturdy and not wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Aoki

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still going to use it but had problem with legs.
customer_reviews.author: Chesley G Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: Held up exceptionally well to a tough summer in the mountains.
customer_reviews.author: Laura T.

customer_reviews.title: I totally recommend this portable table
customer_reviews.text: I totally recommend this portable table. It goes with me everywhere we go in the camper. It's very handy for everything from cleaning fish, table for outdoor cooking, or stand for an outdoor TV. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: dv45

customer_reviews.title: Best Table Yet
customer_reviews.text: This table has made cleaning catfish so much easier. It's just the right height and the textured surface keeps the fish from sliding around, but it easy to wash off. We plan on taking it to deer camp too!
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We are using this workstation in a factory environment to assist us in cleaning process line tanks. The rinse water must be captured and disposed of separately. This workstation is set up perfect for this application as we collect the water in pails for disposal. The garbage bag holder is very convenient to collect all the cleaning wipes that we use. Cleanup is simple and we fold the station up when we are not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ross D.

customer_reviews.title: its great
customer_reviews.text: I use it in the back yard. Makes a great prep table for the BBQ Having a spot for a trash bag is great when working with food. The drain tubes work great.
customer_reviews.author: clint

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this is the greatest item for outdoor use i have ever purchased well built sturdy everything i wanted thanks amazon and coldcreekoutfitters for making such a useful product
customer_reviews.author: david dillingham

customer_reviews.title: A must have for camping.
customer_reviews.text: I received a lot of complement with this work station. Solidly build. Good for preparing meals, washing dishes, utility table etc...
customer_reviews.author: N. Dao

customer_reviews.title: Good Sink
customer_reviews.text: Good portable sink. Worked really good after a trip to Lowes for a cheap sink faucet and some hose adapters.
customer_reviews.author: David Lawhorn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great addition for campsite. Made food prep much easier. The trash bag holder is a really good feature.
customer_reviews.author: J.Pagan

customer_reviews.title: better than the work bench
customer_reviews.text: Used about 10 times this summer, better than the work bench, and easy cleanup, but about 6 inches too short, so I put blocks under the legs to get it up higher so I do not have to bend over.
customer_reviews.author: Pigeonman

customer_reviews.title: Great table for Burning Man or Camping
customer_reviews.text: This table we took to Burning Man it worked out great, loved the tube for water drain made it easy for dumping.
customer_reviews.author: Nikko

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our gear
customer_reviews.text: We use this for Camping. Can't believe we we camped all these years without it. Great addition to our gear.
customer_reviews.author: Jera Moran

customer_reviews.title: Product is what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product because of it's multi-use. I considered purchasing the one with the facet, but didn't like the idea of having to take the faucet off each time I folded the table. The clip for the garden hose works fine. I would recommend this to anyone who needs a fish processing table or portable table for other uses.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hash

customer_reviews.title: Great table.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a prep table for camping that is not so low. I am only 5'2" and have a camping kitchen stand that I love. But ...... After a short while my back is hurting from bending over to prep. I can't imagine how hard it would be for someone taller. This table is great! Lightweight, folds flat, easy-to-clean. All good qualities in a camping table.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Renihan

customer_reviews.title: Great For camping.
customer_reviews.text: We used it as a dishwashing sink for a camping trip with a youth group. it worked great and it's sturdy. Easy to open and put together, to close and put away. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect for what I needed for
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for what I needed for. We just went camping an use it, we like it a lot. Thanks amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Haven't cleaned any fish yet, but did open the ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't cleaned any fish yet, but did open the table to be sure it worked. I can't get over how stable and secure it feels. In the event I find anything adverse when I catch something, I'll let you know.
customer_reviews.author: new Floridian

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Every fisherman or woman's dream cleaning table, this is a must have for cleaning fish and the clean up is easy, just wish it was taller , great product love it
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product!!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly, great product...was a gift for my son in law for Christmas. Has a lot of great features and good for use with any time of game, fish, venison...
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband and he loved it. Very sturdy table.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Y Susnir

customer_reviews.title: awesome sink
customer_reviews.text: awesome camping sink!! light, easy to set up and sturdy. makes camping awesome
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Happy fiance!
customer_reviews.text: My fiance LOVES his table! Awesome price too! He liked my dad's and then I got him this one and he likes it even more.
customer_reviews.author: Niffer Hall

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to clean fish and other messy things on. he loves it and so do i!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura R

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well designed
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight yet durable and sturdy. The design is brilliant especially the sink drain into a container. Plenty of working space and easy to wipe down and clean.
customer_reviews.author: David T. Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: My small business uses this table to wash up during Farmers Markets and it works exceptionally well. It is sturdy and well built and the sinks are great for storage when put away due to the secured lids. I would definitely recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Morris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I used this table while camping and it was perfect! I don't even know how I got along without it for so many years. It is a good height to use as a workspace (chopping, washing dishes, ect.) and the built-in trash receptacle is very convenient. Definitely my favorite new camp equipment buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi L Barry

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! Table was just used to fillet a limit of walleye and the garbage bag holder worked great!
customer_reviews.author: ishot3bucks

customer_reviews.title: Fish Cleaning Table
customer_reviews.text: Works great, enough space, sturdy, two sinks are helpful. Would like to have it a bit higher but it's not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great Table, No Issues at All
customer_reviews.text: Great table, have used it only a couple of time but I can tell it will last a long time. Quick shipment and excellent double boxed packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton R Bryant Jr

customer_reviews.title: Overall- Good
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several tables before chosing this on. The plus was the 2 sinks and trash compartment. However, the negative is one of the bars that is suppose to hold the trash bag does not snap down....appears to not fit correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Brady

customer_reviews.title: Fishing
customer_reviews.text: The table was a gift for my husband. He love it. Great portability, easy setup an storage. Just the right height. Love it. Did not have to rewash the fish.
customer_reviews.author: Shelia

customer_reviews.title: table would be great but came damages
customer_reviews.text: The size and functions of the table are good and just as described. I bought as a gift though and it was cracked upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Wiechman

customer_reviews.title: great for food prep and cleaning dishes
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I modified it with a hose/spray head and a clip-on tray for soap & scrubber. Makes cleaning dishes a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: randall oliver

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and clean. Made cleaning and filleting fish outdoors so much better. My husband and fishing buddies loved it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Henschell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Table
customer_reviews.text: This table is great, very good construction and not really heavy. I use it for camping to wash dishes. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID MUNOZ

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: I keep this table set up at the pool. It is handy for many things besides cleaning fish and camping. Heck, ice some beer down in the sinks. Put the sink covers in and use it to serve dessert. Fold it up and put it away if you need the space.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate Outdoor Workstation
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this but soon disappointed when received. The product arrived on time but the only thing I got was the table and none of the accessories! I immediately called amazon and they were ready to issue an RMA and send a new one. I decided I would try my luck with the manufacturer. I called them and they immediately apologized for the problem and asked me to send them proof of purchase, within a few days I received a brand new table with all the accessories and they allowed me to keep the first table I received! Outstanding customer service! I would highly recommend as the table is just as described and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My whole family uses this for camping and just around the outside of our house.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Hill

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table! But the metal rings that are supposed to come with the table to hold the plastic bag in place didn't come. Kinda stinks without all the parts.
customer_reviews.author: MaTeO

customer_reviews.title: DON"T WASTE your TIME OR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Came with one side of the legs unattached from sink top, screws were missing and the screw holes were stripped. Extremely disapointed with this product and Coldcreek Outfitters. Hopfully I can rig this piece of junk so I may get some type of use for it other than taking up space on the floor of my garage In short, don't waste your hard earned dollars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Coldcreek Outfitters, Outdoor Washing Table and Sink, Camping Furniture, Outdoor Recreation - Ultimate Workstation
product_meta.description:
Ultimate Workstation [CC302]

1040 square inches of working surface (40" x 26")

Coldcreek Outfitters Ultimate Workstation with Faucet is constructed of high-density polyethylene with a durable steel frame designed for stability and long-lasting durability. With a well-thought out work surface, the injection-molded tabletop has everything needed to work or play outdoors. This table features 2 molded-in sinks, with full drain system, as well as insert covers to convert wash area to a flat work surface. Also included is a rotating hose holder and refuse hole with easy-snap locking system in place to hold a small plastic garbage bag in place for added convenience.
feature_bullets: PORTABLE OUTDOOR STATION - This outdoor washing table has 2 deep sinks to give you plenty of space for washing outdoors. They are designed to be portable and collapsible so it's easy to take down and transport outdoors. Ideal for camping and hunting!
MULTIPLE USES - With 2 sinks measuring 1.5 inches deep and the other at 4.5 inches deep, there are plenty of spaces and storage to meet any washing needs. Both sinks include removable drain plugs.

33 INCH HEIGHT - This workstation sits at the ideal standing height - 33 inches. It offers great ergonomic position for most users. Fillet your fish or wash hands comfortably. You'll love this workstation so much you'll think you are luxury camping!
2 DURABLE SINKS - The sinks on our work table are made with high-density polyethylene for long-lasting durability and stability. The material is lightweight, so it’s easy to move around.

EASY SET UP - The ultimate workstation is easy to use and quickly lets you clean camping supplies in either sink station. Fast to set up and take down, you can quickly get to your favorite activities. Camping accessories that you can't live without!
